quality_of_application_what_to_improve: Add more as to why you want to teach secondary school age students and try to 'upskill' on curriculum knowledge  to meet the demands of training as a salaried trainee.
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: Only briefly mentions students in the personal statement, it is very focused on achievements and previous career experiences. Also, we do not think he explains why he wants to teach secondary school age students and we think this is important when you are applying to be an English teacher. From his background and degree, we are not sure how he has the foundation knowledge in literature and language to teach it as a salaried trainee, we think he would need to do a lot of 'upskilling' to meet the demands of being a salaried trainee in a core curriculum subject.
